description: Using the same lines from the second half of Saturday's win, the Flames look to keep the ball rolling in Anaheim
message: "I could care less about any streaks that have happened in the past. Every year is different. Every game is different. Tonight will be a tough test for our group but coming out of our last game, the win, we're feeling confident … I think we're up for the challenge."
name: Calgary Flames
